params.claimIndex: Index of the claim to step against

attack(uint256,bytes32).notice: Attacks a claim by providing a counter-claim

claimCountered(uint256).notice: Mapping of claim index to whether it has been countered

createdAt().notice: Returns the timestamp when the game was created

creator().notice: Returns the address of the creator of this game

defend(uint256,bytes32).notice: Defends a claim by providing a supporting claim

extraData().notice: Returns extra data for the game (implementation specific)

getClaim(uint256).notice: Returns claim data for a specific index

resolve().notice: Resolves the game and distributes bonds

resolvedAt().notice: Returns the timestamp when the game resolved (0 if not resolved)

rootClaim().notice: Returns the root claim being disputed

step(uint256,bytes).notice: Executes a single instruction step to resolve a leaf dispute
